Title: S.w.a.t.
Actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Colin Farrell, Michelle Rodriguez
Description: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody and only the LAPD's Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.
